00034 RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::gsMenuBase(){
00035   LOGI("Constructing a  gsMenuBase");
00036   velocity=NULL;
00037   stateType=GST_MENU;
00038   inputWrapper=new InputWrapper();
00039 }

00044 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::init(){
00045   LOGI("Initialising gsMenuBase");
00046   yBorder=1.1f;
00047   yBorderFrom=0.0f;
00048   yBorderTo=0.0f;
00049 
00050   initFrameNumber=3;
00051   initFrameCount=0;
00052 
00053   inTransition=false;
00054 
00055   // if yBorder=0.0f, u=1.0, v=0.7
00056   uMappingScreenSize=0.5f;
00057   vMappingScreenSize=0.7f;
00058 
00059   mRoot=GameEngine::getSingleton().getOgreRoot();
00060   mSceneMgr=GameEngine::getSingleton().getOgreSceneMgr();
00061 
00062   menuNode = mSceneMgr->getRootSceneNode()
00063     ->createChildSceneNode("Menu");
00064 
00065   translateTo(0.0);
00066 
00067   drawMenuBackground();
00068   drawDynamicBackground();
00069   drawBorder();
00070   setCorners();
00071   isInit=true;
00072 }
00073 
00077 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::cleanup(){
00078   if (velocity){
00079     delete velocity;
00080     velocity=NULL;
00081   }
00082 
00083   delete inputWrapper;
00084 }

00111 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::drawBorder(){
00112   LOGI("Draw border");
00113 
00114   // Create background material
00115   MaterialPtr material = MaterialManager::getSingleton().create("Border", "General");
00116 
00117   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->createTextureUnitState("border.jpg");
00118   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthCheckEnabled(false);
00119   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthWriteEnabled(false);
00120   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setLightingEnabled(false);
00121   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)
00122     ->setTextureScale(1.0f, 0.25f);
00123   
00124   // Create background rectangle covering the whole screen
00125   bordRect = new Rectangle2D(true);
00126   //rect->setCorners(-1.0, 1.0, 1.0, -1.0);
00127   bordRect->setCorners(yBorder-0.05f, 1.0, yBorder+0.05f, -1.0);
00128   bordRect->setMaterial("Border");
00129   
00130   bordRect->setBoundingBox(AxisAlignedBox(-100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE, 
00131                                       100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE));
00132   
00133   // Attach background to the scene
00134   SceneNode* node = menuNode->createChildSceneNode("Border");
00135   node->attachObject(bordRect);
00136 }

00141 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::drawMenuBackground(){
00142   LOGI("Draw MenuBackground");
00143 
00144   // Create background material
00145   MaterialPtr material = MaterialManager::getSingleton()
00146     .create("StaticBackground", "General");
00147 
00148   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)
00149     ->createTextureUnitState("staticmenu.jpg");
00150 
00151   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthCheckEnabled(false);
00152   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthWriteEnabled(false);
00153   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setLightingEnabled(false);
00154   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)
00155     ->setTextureScale(uMappingScreenSize, vMappingScreenSize);
00156   
00157   menuRect = new Rectangle2D(true);
00158   menuRect->setMaterial("StaticBackground");
00159 
00160   menuRect->setBoundingBox(AxisAlignedBox(-100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE, 
00161                                       100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE));
00162  
00163   // Attach background to the scene
00164   SceneNode* node = menuNode->createChildSceneNode("StaticBackground");
00165   node->attachObject(menuRect);
00166 }

00171 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::drawDynamicBackground(){
00172   LOGI("Draw DynamicBackground");
00173 
00174   // Create background material
00175   MaterialPtr material = MaterialManager::getSingleton().create("DynamicBackground", "General");
00176   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->createTextureUnitState("dynamicmenu.jpg");
00177   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthCheckEnabled(false);
00178   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthWriteEnabled(false);
00179   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setLightingEnabled(false);
00180   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)
00181     ->setTextureScale(uMappingScreenSize, vMappingScreenSize);
00182   
00183   // Create background rectangle covering the whole screen
00184   dynaRect = new Rectangle2D(true);
00185   dynaRect->setMaterial("DynamicBackground");
00186   
00187   dynaRect->setBoundingBox(AxisAlignedBox(-100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE, 
00188                                       100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE));
00189   
00190   // Attach background to the scene
00191   SceneNode* node = menuNode->createChildSceneNode("DynamicBackground");
00192   node->attachObject(dynaRect);
00193 }

00207 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::transition(){
00208   if (inTransition){
00209     if (velocity){
00210       // Engine initialization
00211       if (initFrameCount<initFrameNumber){
00212         initFrameCount++;
00213         velocity->reset();
00214       }
00215       else{
00216         yBorder-=  velocity->getNextFrame(inTransition);
00217       }
00218 
00219       // If the transition is ended
00220       if (!inTransition){
00221         LOGI("Transition ended");
00222         yBorder=yBorderTo;
00223         GuiManager::getSingleton().beginGuiFadeIn();
00224       }
00225     }
00226     else{
00227       LOGW("Cannot get translation value, VelocityCalculator pointer is NULL");
00228     }
00229     setCorners();
00230   }
00231 }
00232 
00236 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::setCorners(){
00237   bordRect->setCorners(yBorder-0.05f, 1.0, yBorder+0.05f, -1.0);
00238   dynaRect->setCorners(yBorder-2.10f, 1.0, yBorder-0.05f, -1.0);
00239   menuRect->setCorners(yBorder+0.05f, 1.0, yBorder+2.05f, -1.0);
00240 
00241 }
00242 
00248 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::translateTo(float f){
00249   LOGI("Setting gsMenuBase translation");
00250   inTransition=true;
00251   yBorderFrom=yBorder;
00252   yBorderTo=f;
00253 
00254   if (velocity){
00255     velocity->setTranslationLenght(getTranslationLenght(yBorderFrom, 
00256                                                         yBorderTo));
00257     velocity->start();
00258   }
00259   else{
00260     LOGW("Cannot start VelocityCalculator, pointer is NULL");
00261   }
00262 
00263 }
00264 
00272 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::isInTransition(){
00273   return this->inTransition;
00274 }
00275 
00289 float RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::getTranslationLenght(float from, 
00290                                                              float to){
00291 
00292   float ret=0.0f;
00293 
00294   if (from>=0.0f && to>=0.0f){
00295     ret=from-to;
00296   }
00297   else if (from>=0.0f && to<0.0f){
00298     ret=from;
00299     ret-=to;
00300   }
00301   else{
00302     LOGW("getTranslationLenght's case not implemented");
00303   }
00304   LOGI("getTranslationLenght debug :");
00305   LOGCATS("From :");
00306   LOGCATF(from);
00307   LOGCATS(" To :");
00308   LOGCATF(to);
00309   LOGCATS(" ret= ");
00310   LOGCATF(ret);
00311   LOGCAT();
00312 
00313   return ret;
00314 }

00323 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::frameStarted(const FrameEvent& evt){
00324 
00325 
00326   if (isInTransition())
00327     transition();
00328 
00329 }

00372 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::mouseMoved(const OIS::MouseEvent& evt){
00373   int x=evt.state.X.rel;
00374   int y=evt.state.Y.rel;
00375   float deltaX=x*inputWrapper->getMouseMenuSensibility();
00376   float deltaY=y*inputWrapper->getMouseMenuSensibility();
00377 
00378   CEGUI::System::getSingleton().injectMouseMove(deltaX, deltaY);
00379   return true;
00380 }

00390 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::
00391 mousePressed(const OIS::MouseEvent& evt, OIS::MouseButtonID id){
00392 
00393   CEGUI::System::getSingleton().injectMouseButtonDown(
00394     inputWrapper->OISButtontoCEGUI(id));
00395 
00396   return true;
00397 }
00398 
00407 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsMenuBase::
00408 mouseReleased(const OIS::MouseEvent& evt, OIS::MouseButtonID id){
00409 
00410   CEGUI::System::getSingleton().injectMouseButtonUp(
00411     inputWrapper->OISButtontoCEGUI(id));
00412 
00413   return true;
00414 }
